Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) have many attractive features for widespread applications.
Titulo: Thermal start-up behaviour and thermal management of SOFC's

Sentencas: The high operating temperature provides a valuable heat source and in contrast to low temperature fuel cells they not only tolerate substances such as CO but can even use them as fuel.
Titulo: Thermal start-up behaviour and thermal management of SOFC's

Sentencas: Thus, reforming of hydrocarbon fuels for SOFCs can be done without additional gas purification.
Titulo: Thermal start-up behaviour and thermal management of SOFC's

Sentencas: As both stack and hydrocarbon reformer unit have to be operated at high temperatures (700-1000 degrees C), thermal management plays an important role in the successful operation of SOFC systems.
Titulo: Thermal start-up behaviour and thermal management of SOFC's

Sentencas: As the SOFC system contains ceramic components, both large thermal gradients in the system and thermal expansion coefficient (TEC) mismatch must be avoided.
Titulo: Thermal start-up behaviour and thermal management of SOFC's

Sentencas: Matching TECs is done by selecting the suitable materials.
Titulo: Thermal start-up behaviour and thermal management of SOFC's

Sentencas: Avoiding high temperature gradients is done by selecting the right system design and control strategies.
Titulo: Thermal start-up behaviour and thermal management of SOFC's

Sentencas: In order to achieve both, we have built a finite element simulation for a complete SOFC systems which allows to study system parameters both during steady operation and during transients.
Titulo: Thermal start-up behaviour and thermal management of SOFC's

Sentencas: Examples of the thermal start-up behaviour for several system configurations are given for selected components as well as internal temperatures of the SOFC-stack during start-up.
Titulo: Thermal start-up behaviour and thermal management of SOFC's

Sentencas: The simulation model includes also the option to simulate the effects of internal methane reformation in the SOFC stack.
Titulo: Thermal start-up behaviour and thermal management of SOFC's

Sentencas: As the minimum operation temperature is high, cooling down of the system has to be avoided if instant operation is desired.
Titulo: Thermal start-up behaviour and thermal management of SOFC's

Sentencas: This can be achieved either passively by selecting suitable thermal insulation materials and/or actively by adopting a strategy for maintaining the temperature.
Titulo: Thermal start-up behaviour and thermal management of SOFC's
